p: The total antioxidant capacity was also characterized by neutralization of the radical cation of 2,2 ′-azino -bis(3 -ethylbenzo thiazoline -6 -sulphonic acid). The ABTS activity obtained for M. spicata essential oil (IC 50 value of 40.2 ± 0.2 μg/mL) was more potent than those described [ 30] for M. spicata grown in Iran (IC 50 value of 173.80 μg/mL) .
